name: Apart Rauch
description:
check in: 2:00 p.m. 
check out: the latest 9:30 a.m.
All prices incl. local tax and finalcleaning.
apartement Mayrhofen, apartement Zillertal, Apartment Ramsau, Apartment Hippach, Skiing Mayrhofen,

Our hous is located quietly but yet centrally in the Mayrhofen-Hippach Holiday-Region on the sunny side of the Ziller Valley in Bichl in Ramsau. 

Distances:
Ski Resort Horbergbahn - Mayrhofen - Penken ca. 1,5 km 
Zillertalarena 4 km, 
Hochzillertal 12 km
Skibus-Stop 150 m 
Zillertaler Gletscher 30 km
Mayrhofen City 3,5 km, Zell am Ziller 4 km

We offer two family-friendly Non- smoking apartments suitable for 2 - 7 persons.
* WiFi-Internet free
*Free parking in front of the house 
*  Bread roll service on request
* Restaurants close by
* free entry to “Sommerwelt Hippach” incl. outdoor pools in Hippach and Mayrhofen (only Summer)

In Summer our house is an ideal base for walking or activities of any kind. Well-maintained hiking trails invite you to explore the natural beauty of the Zillertal. From leisurely walks along the Ziller Promenade, a hut hiking in one of our romantic side valleys to the mountain tour of the impressive three-thousand - it is something for everyone.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet
makesOffer.description:
The approximately 75 square meters apartment "HORBERG" is a sunny and friendly Non smoking apartment.
2 bedroom
Bedroom 1: 	 
Double bed (180 x 200 cm), 3-door cabinet and a sofa - even as a convenient bed for                 
1 person use (90 x 190), 2 bedside cabinets

Bedroom 2:	
Double bed (180 x 200 cm), 2-door cabinet 2 bedside cabinets


Living area/kitchen
In the bright living room with flat screen satellite TV and Internet is a sofa with bed function, which can be converted if necessary in a few steps into a comfortable sleeping place for 2 people (2-door wardrobe in the hallway provides storage space).  
The modern dinette with dining table and 3 chairs offers 7 people enough space.

The kitchen is very well equipped. From the oven, ceramic hob, dishwasher, sink, cooker, microwave, refrigerator, freezer, filter coffee machine to the kettle is all there.
Dinnerware and cookware, cutlery and glasses are also available.

2 Bathrooms /Toilet

Here you will find a very special luxury. The apartment has 2 modern bathrooms.

Bathroom 1: 
Shower, toilet, double washbasin including cabinet, mirror, heated towel rail

Bathroom 2: 
shower, toilet, washbasin including cabinet and heated towel rail.
In winter the under floor heating ensures even in the bathroom for warmth.

Wardrobe
Wardrobe cabinet, panel and mirror, stool and shoe rack
Garden and Terrace
Small terrace (garden furniture in summer only), and small lawn

Bed linen and towels
Bed linen, hand and bath towels and tea towels are provided once at the arrival.

Parking
Parking a few meters from the entrance area

Pets
Pets by arrangement only

Consumables
Consumables (toilet paper, dishwashing liquid. ...) Please bring your own.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
The approximately 65 square meters apartment "Sonnalm" is a sunny and friendly Non smoking apartment.

2 bedroom
Bedroom 1: 	 
Double bed (180 x 200 cm), 3-door cabinet and a sofa - even as a convenient bed for                 
1 person use (90 x 190), 2 bedside cabinets

Bedroom 2:	
Double bed (180 x 200 cm), 2-door cabinet 2 bedside cabinets

Living area/kitchen:
In the bright living room with flat screen satellite TV and Internet is a sofa with bed function, which can be converted if necessary in a few steps into a comfortable sleeping place for 2 people. A 2-door wardrobe provides storage space. The modern dinette with dining table and 3 chairs offers 7 people enough space.

The kitchen is very well equipped. From the oven, ceramic hob, dishwasher, sink, cooker, microwave, refrigerator, freezer, filter coffee machine to the kettle is all there.
Dinnerware and cookware, cutlery and glasses are also available.

Bathroom /Toilet
You can expect a modern bathroom with shower, toilet, washbasin including cabinet and heated towel rail.
In winter the under floor heating ensures even in the bathroom for warmth.

Toilet
1 separate Toilet with hand basin 
Wardrobe
Wardrobe cabinet, panel and mirror, stool and shoe rack

Garden and Terrace
Terrace (garden furniture in summer only) partial use of the garden

Bed linen and towels
Bed linen, hand and bath towels and tea towels are provided once at the arrival.

Parking
Parking a few meters from the entrance area
